name: 資料探勘
restrict: ◎限本系(含雙主修)修習 ◎課程開放上修
goals: 能夠瞭解如何選擇正確的探勘模式
能夠解讀探勘結果並撰述分析報告
能夠從探勘結果提出輔助商業決策方案
syllabus:
1.  Introduction to Data Mining for Data Science
2.  R Lab 1. Starting with R and exploring data
3.  R Lab 2. Managing data and reshaping
4.  Method 1. Linear model
5.  Cont.
6.  Method 2. Generalized linear model as a classification tool
7.  Cont.
8.  1st written test
9.  Advanced methods with marketing case 1: Predicting Consumer Choice
10.  Advanced methods with marketing case 2: Targeting Current Customers
11.  Advanced methods with marketing case 3: Finding New Consumers
12.  Advanced methods with marketing case 4: Positioning Products
13.  Advanced methods with marketing case 5: Developing New Products
14.  Team project presentation
15.  Team project presentation
16.  Final written test

grading.note: Team presentation(Optional! Or equally shared with other three items)

prerequisite: ◎Exclusive for students within this department(including dual degree program) ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
